1161560.name: Vital Signs: ED - Pediatric Digestive Disease Package
1161560.description:
Continue your career in Vital Signs: Emergency Department with this downloadable content pack. Focus solely on the eight newly added patients by completing the Pediatric Digestive Cases scenario that comes with this pack, or encounter them during the course of a 2 or 4 hour random shift!

New patients included with this Pediatric Digestive Disease Package:

  • 3wk M with bilious vomiting
  • 16yo F abdominal pain, diarrhea, fatigue
  • 14mo M with vomiting, abd pain
  • 10yo M with HA and Vomiting
  • 3wk M with 1d vomiting and lethargy
  • 14mo M with vomiting, abd pain
  • 6wk M with vomiting
  • 13yo F abdominal pain and fever
1161560.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
